page.title: 13TRANSPORT IN SWAFFHAM
page.content: In Swaffham there are many kinds of transport.Most people use bicycles mostly the old people because they can't afford to run a car also there are many bus and coaches that run frequently to and from Swaffham.We have Clarkes coaches they are fully furnished with television and video and reclining chairs.They base their coaches down Whitsands Road they have a hard job to get the coaches out of the drive since Whitsands Road is not very wide.we also have Eastern Counties which run from Kings Lynn to Swaffham and finally to Norwich.We have mini bus services round Swaffham, they are called Foulshams mini bus hire.We have other buses come from other towns and villages like Eagle, Matthews and Peggs.
